name: age_8_11
label: Children aged 8 to 11
definition: Children aged 8-11 as a % of the total population

name: age_12_19
label: Children aged 12 to 19
definition: Children aged 12-19 as a % of the total population

name: lone_parent
label: Lone-parent families
definition: Lone parent families as a % of all families

name: no_knowledge_of_official_languages
label: No knowledge of official languages
definition: Population with no knowledge of either French or English as a % of the total population

name: low_income_population
label: Low Income
definition: Population living below the after-tax Low-income measure (LIM-AT) as a % of the total population

name: modest_income
label: Modest income
definition: % of the population with income greater than the after-tax Low-income measure LIM-AT, but below the 30th income percentile

name: avg_after_tax_income_25_over
label: Average after-tax income, 25+
definition: Average after-tax income for the population aged 25+

name: low_income_youth_aged_15_19
label: Low-income youths (15-19)
definition: Population aged 20-24 with low incomes (LIM AT)

name: low_income_youth_aged_20_24
label: Low Income youths (20-24)
definition: Population aged 20-24 with low incomes (LIM AT)

name: households_in_subsidised_housing
label: Subsidised housing
definition: Households living in subsidized housing as a % of all households

name: affordable_housing
label: Affordable housing
definition: % of households spending 30% or more of income on housing

name: recent_immigrants
label: Recent immigrants
definition: % of the population that arrived in Canada within the past 5 years

name: indigenous_population
label: Indigenous population
definition: % of the population that self-identifies as Aboriginal

name: indigenous_youth_aged_10_14
label: Indigenous youths (10-14)
definition: % of the population aged 10-14 that self-identifies as Aboriginal

name: indigenous_youth_aged_15_24
label: Indigenous youths (15-24)
definition: % of the population aged 15-24 that self-identifies as Aboriginal

name: immigrant_youth_aged_15_24
label: Immigrant youths
definition: % of the population aged 15-24 that is foreign born

name: visible_minority
label: Visible minority
definition: % of the population that is a visible minority

name: educational_disadvantage_youth_20_24
label: Educational disadvantage youths (20-24)
definition: % of the population aged 20-24 that does not have a high school diploma or any other certificate or diploma

name: highschool_youth_25_34
label: High-school educated population youths (25-34)
definition: % of the population aged 25-34 with only a High school diploma or equivalent

name: highschool_adult_35-64
label: High-school educated population adults (35-64)
definition: % of the population aged 35-64 with only a High school diploma or equivalent

name: educational_assets_youth_20_34
label: Educational assets youths (20-34)
definition: % of the population aged 20-34 that has completed a postsecondary certificate, diploma or degree

name: educational_assets_adults_35_64
label: Educational asets adults (35-64)
definition: % of the population aged 35-64 year that has completed a postsecondary certificate, diploma or degree

name: youth_unemployment_20_34
label: Youth unemployment
definition: % of the labour force aged 20-34 that is unemployed

name: adult_unemployment_35_64
label: Adult unemployment
definition: % of the labour force aged 35-64 that is unemployed

name: low_wage_employment_25
label: Low-wage employment
definition: % of the population aged 25+ working in retail trade and accommodation and food services
